response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your organization and answer any questions you might have.", "product_price": 950000}
